transcript_chunks.text: it's me Greg Starfield uh expert right uh more than 100 hours in there no big deal all right New Game Plus 5 still killing it married to Andreia don't worry about it jump in go into your settings when you load up your game cuz gameplay settings are super customizable since you were last there like enemy combat damage uh ship combat damage your combat damage your ships thing ammo weight annoyed you if carrying capacity annoyed you you can dial those in they added the Rev 8 which is that car you can drive around which is a lot of fun the biggest thing I think since they've done it is Creations so Creations are the mods you can upload you can do whatever you want with it and build stuff but thda game studios has put up two quests of their own uh trackers Alliance the vulture but Escape is awesome escape feels like oh this is a wellth thought out contained Quest
